subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Board talk
author: David Koenig
full_text:
So who are the very best at this right now?

On Mon, May 25, 2009 at 9:26 AM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
>  Well, if this leads to fighting, I'm sure Spirit will stop talking to us
> altogether, I tried to call Bill's machine, but I couldn't hear much of
> anything, maybe sound was too low, or maybe someone was hearing what I
> should have been hearing, I'm sure they heard me, but someone on the other
> end was reaping the rewards of my one sided conversation, I'm sure.  Left me
> very unhappy, (p...is..ed o..f). , I sure wish people could make this work
> for all of us though, and give credit where credit is due, Edison told me,
> he was working with a certain couple of people, poor guy, he's running all
> over the place, when people keep asking for his help, he has to stop what
> he's doing to inspire one person, then has to run over to see what all the
> hollering is all about with someone else.  Don't forget, none of this would
> be possible were it not given to us by the Man upstairs, and no one gives
> Him any credit, it's not "religion."  It's called life.
> sf
>
> In a message dated 5/25/2009 8:33:40 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
> floridajakeblues@... writes:
>
>
>
> It would be difficult to respect anyone who's worked with Alison Smith.
>
> On Sun, May 24, 2009 at 8:42 PM, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:
>
>>
>>
>>   Yeah, I think a lot of pretenders do try to find ways to promote
>> themselves into more credibility.  In fact, I wonder about that project you
>> are going to be doing with Mr Moon.  It's my guess he is the one who
>> suggested it (maybe even dropped some profitability hints?).  Realize, his
>> method of performing medium with the box, and charging the vulnerable large
>> amounts of money, is under attack from many quarters, and he has begun to go
>> on the defensive.  One thing that is hard for him to defend, is how he can
>> be so expert with the box when he had nothing to do with its construction.
>>
>> Now consider, if he can get the box's maker to participate in a project
>> together, even just once, he can add to his list of credentials things such
>> as "Worked together with the original box's designer, Frank Sumption, on new
>> designs." Or even "Co-creater of the new Box", whatever it is.
>>
>> You will be giving him that very credibility, that those "do my shows" are
>> looking for.  Maybe even getting him new customers.  Just by associating
>> with him on one project.
>>
>> My advice is, be careful that you aren't just being used for your
>> credentials Frank.
>>
>>
>>
>> --- On *Sun, 5/24/09, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>* wrote:
>>
>>
>> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
>> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Board talk
>> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>> Date: Sunday, May 24, 2009, 4:56 PM
>>
>>    Yeah, real interesting, if ya know something about these various
>> "players" in the field. Yet they wonder why I don't play those "do my show"
>> games. A certain amount here left unsaid, so not too many will get it.
>>
>>  F-S
>>
